sentence.Network_en: I thought that cooking and housekeeping were unimportant, easy tasks.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为做饭和料理家务微不足道，一下子就能搞定。

sentence.Network_en: It was an unimportant job, and paid very little.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份工作无足轻重，而且薪水还很低。

sentence.Network_en: Money seems unimportant when sets beside the joys of family life.
sentence.Network_cn: 与天伦之乐相比,金钱显得微不足道.

He is always troubling me about his unimportant business ., 他总是以他不重要的事情来烦恼我.

entry.tran: 不重要的；无意义的；微不足道的
entry.def: If you describe something or someone as unimportant, you mean that they do not have much influence, effect, or value, and are therefore not worth serious consideration.

example.ex: It was an unimportant job, and paid very little...
example.tran: 这份工作无足轻重，而且薪水还很低。

example.ex: When they had married, six years before, the difference in their ages had seemed unimportant.
example.tran: 他们6年前结婚时，年龄的差距似乎并不重要。

sentences.sentence: "a relatively unimportant feature of the system"

auth_sentence.content: Our human produced Greenhouse Gases could become completely unimportant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our human produced Greenhouse Gases could become completely unimportant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our human produced Greenhouse Gases could become completely unimportant.

auth_sentence.content: Some see the Committee as an unimportant anachronism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some see the Committee as an unimportant anachronism.

auth_sentence.content: The death of a pet is often dismissed as unimportant.
auth_sentence.res_content: The death of a pet is often dismissed as unimportant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The death of a pet is often dismissed as unimportant.

means.word_mean: 不重要的;次要的;无足轻重的

sentences.en: Block out this unimportant detail at the top of your picture.
sentences.cn: 在底片上把图像上部的这个不重要的细节涂抹掉。

sentences.en: He doesn’t deign to talk to unimportant people like me.
sentences.cn: 他不肯屈尊和像我这样不重要的人说话。
